SENT.plain: The Authors report a case of BehÃ§et disease with neurological involvement appeared some years after the initial diagnosis

Clinical evaluation of CNS damages was completed by neurophysiological and neuroradiological tests: Computerized Tomography (CT), Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR), Pyramidal Evoked Potentials (MAPs), Somato Sensorial Evoked Potentials (SEPs), spinal puncture
